title: Great American Cobbler Company, LLC, Recalls Creole Style Chicken Pot Pie Products Due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 11, 2022 – Great American Cobbler LLC., a Homerville, Ga., establishment, is recalling approximately 4,272 pounds of chicken pot pie products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains...
impacted_products: •	2-lb. cardboard box sleeve containing “GREAT AMERICAN Pot Pie Handcrafted Premium Creole Style Chicken Pot Pie” with lot codes “21231” and “21307” and best by dates of 02/19/2023 and 05/03/2023.
